title: He's My Mate
description: “She was it, and I had no intentions of letting her go, ever.”  Charlene Craig, a shy young girl, moved to Houghton with hopes for a fresh start. She’s trying to live an isolated life this time, a life far away from all her troubles. However, here comes the revered Chemistry teacher, Jonathan Garner. His classes always attract female students to the front row, and many vied for his attention, except Charlene. But deep inside, both have insatiable hunger towards each other. Despite the mutual attraction, Charlene is hell bent in staying as far away from Jonathan as she possibly could. Is Charlene keeping a secret? What conflicts await in Houghton? How will Charlene and Jonathan make this work? Will this be a story of betrayal or of triumph?  This passionate forbidden romance is not just what it seems to be. Grab your own copy now!
author: K. Konyana
